Sometimes you come across games that you keep going back to. Trying to wake the feelings you got the first time you played it. This is one of those brilliant games, even though you can never experience the feelings you got the first time you played it. 
Portal 2 (and portal 1) are rare games. Games like this aren't made very often anymore. Unfortunately.
But you keep going back from time to time for the nostagia, and to relive the fantastic experience.

At least this is my opinion of the game. Good luck and keep testing
this an amazing game the plot twist is crazy

mega gutes game nur eine sache die einem extrem auf den keks geht beim online zocken kommen immer vider intro videos die einige minuten zeit kosten danach wenns dann endlich losgeht ist der teamkolege afk oder kann nicht schreiben weils nen 10 j'hriges kind is is ja auch nicht weiter schlimm man kann ja einfach solange suchen bis man nen f'higen teamkolegen hat nur muss man halt jedesmal sich das into reinziehen und so kommt es dann zu momenten dass man ne ne halbe stunde warten muss und sich immer wieder und wieder das video reinziehen muss....
The best game in the world - play portal 1, then portal 2
i like it go play    5/5 stars

I'll try to keep it short. I have never written one of These before and i have never played & enjoyed (let alone finished) a Puzzle-Game before!

However, i just finished PORTAL 2 - like 5 minutes ago, for the very first time.
Because i don't like Puzzle-Games (mainly because i'm just not good at them at all) i pretty much "ignored" PORTAL and PORTAL 2 for a long time.
But now, after finishing both of 'em - i can only say this:
"I absolutely adore this Game and i fully enjoyed EVERYTHING about it!"

So yeah, maybe i will finally try and play other Games where you actually have to use your Brain for once but first...

...I'm gonna go back and play through The Portal Games again!
Why? Well because Portal 2 just became one of my Favorite Games (I know I'm a bit late)!
At least i finally get it now - you know what all the Fuss is about - why so many People praise THESE Games :-)

Sorry, i said i'm gonna make it short. So, if you're still on the fence about buying and playing PORTAL 2 - you're missing out! Just give it try. I fully recommend PORTAL 2(and Portal).
You know it's almost kinda spooky - EVERY SINGLE Game i played that was made by VALVE has become one of my favorite Games (I'm not trying to blow smoke here, it's just how i feel).

I don't use this word lightly but PORTAL 2 really is A MASTERPIECE imo.
Thank you for making it - i wish you Guys all the Best.

Greetings from Roland.
gute story, gute grafik und eun geiles spielerlebnis
One of the best games ever!! Great story, great gameplay, awesome puzzles. Also not to mention that this game combines more genres(except romantic) : comedy, drama, etc. I highly recommend it!
